summary: A fun weekend turns into madness and horror for a bunch of groupies looking for fun in a beaver infested swamp.
cast: Rachel Melvin|Cortney Palm|Lexi Atkins|Hutch Dano|Jake Weary|Peter Gilroy|Rex Linn|Brent Briscoe|Phyllis Katz|Robert R. Shafer|Bill Burr|John Mayer|Jordan Rubin|Sonny Tanning|Fred Tatasciore|Backstreet Boys|Chad Anderson
title: Castores zombies
